mapper.select: select a.* from ma_wf_lcphase a order by a.DATASEQ
select a.* from ma_wf_lcphase a where guid=#GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_wf_lcphase ( guid, mawffk, LCMASTERGUID, LCPHASEGUID, DATASEQ, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MAWFFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LCMASTERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LCPHASEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update ma_wf_lcphase
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, mawffk=#MAWFFK#, LCMASTERGUID=#LCMASTERGUID#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, LCPHASEGUID=#LCPHASEGUID#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
